General.Name: CSL Finance Limited
General.Description: CSL Finance Limited, a non-banking financial company, engages in the wholesale and SME retail lending businesses in India. It offers loans for real estate developers, such as loans against property and securities; loan for small builders, including construction finance, and refinance and inventory funding; corporate loans; and loans for education, medical, agriculture, and FMCG trading industries, as well as Salaried professionals. The company was formerly known as Consolidated Securities Limited and changed its name to CSL Finance Limited in January 2016. CSL Finance Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Noida, India.
